stxxl::stream::generator2stream< Generator_ > Class Template Reference
[Stream package]

A model of steam that outputs data from an adaptable generator functor For convinience use streamify function instead of direct instantiation of generator2stream . More...

Detailed Description

template<class Generator_>
class stxxl::stream::generator2stream< Generator_ >

A model of steam that outputs data from an adaptable generator functor For convinience use streamify function instead of direct instantiation of generator2stream .
